definition: to close/to stop up/to shut/to obstruct
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Parliamentis prorogue for the summer recess.
Let's appoint a time for the meeting.
I can't go, she'll go instead of me.
sentences.chinese: 我可以替我有病的兄弟去闭会。

sentences.english: There being no further business , I declared the meeting closed.
sentences.chinese: 由于没有别的事了，我宣布闭会。

sentences.english: Set time and place of next DA meeting before the meeting ends.
sentences.chinese: 在行动指导会议闭会前确定下次会议的时间和地点。

sentences.english: As there was no further business, I declared the meeting closed.
sentences.chinese: 由于没有别的事了，我宣布闭会。

sentences.english: Could you tell me where we will have the meeting this afternoon?
sentences.chinese: 你能通知我我们明天下午将在哪儿闭会吗？

sentences.english: I'd like to raise a new question before the meeting is over.
sentences.chinese: 会议闭会前我想提出一个新的问题。

definition: general congress/meeting of the whole committee
the curtain falls/lower the curtain/to come to an end (of a meeting)
(Chinese) National People's Congress/abbr. to 人大[Ren2 da4]
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4
Zhong1 yang1 Zhi2 xing2 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 zhi4 Xie2 shang1 Hui4 yi4
related.word: 中国人民政治协商会议

definition: CPPCC (Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference)/abbr. of 中國人民政治協商會議|中国人民政治协商会议[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 zhi4 Xie2 shang1 Hui4 yi4]
plenary session of the Central Committee
abbr. for 全國人大會議|全国人大会议[Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 hui4 yi4], National People's Congress (NPC)
standing committee (e.g. of National People's Congress)
national general congress/Communist party national congress, in recent times every five years
